# WKUserInterfaceDirectionPolicy.system

**Case**

The directionality follows the view’s user interface layout direction.

## Declaration

```swift
case system
```

## Discussion

The web view adheres to the direction in its [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSView/userInterfaceLayoutDirection] property.

## Direction Policies

- **WKUserInterfaceDirectionPolicy.content**: The directionality follows the CSS/HTML/XHTML specifications.
